tp:treatment-sec.title: Notes
tp:treatment-sec.p: n.sp. described from specimens collected in this study (Martínez and Zaldívar-Riverón 2010)

element-citation.article-title: A new species of Neoheterospilus (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Doryctinae) from Chamela, Jalisco, Mexico
